faq_responses.shipping_info: We offer free shipping on orders over $50. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, and express shipping takes 1-2 business days.
faq_responses.return_policy: We have a 30-day return policy. Items must be in original condition with tags attached. Return shipping is free for defective items.
faq_responses.product_care: Care instructions vary by product. Most fabric items are machine washable on gentle cycle. Check individual product pages for specific care instructions.
faq_responses.warranty: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship.
faq_responses.pillow_care: Pillows should be fluffed daily and washed every 3-6 months. Use a gentle cycle with mild detergent.
faq_responses.diffuser_usage: Fill the diffuser with water up to the max line, add 3-5 drops of essential oil, and select your preferred timer setting.
